dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your tarot reading business.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage your upcoming and past appointments.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been booked.
schedule.step1_desc_new: Choose an existing client or add a new one.
schedule.step2_desc: Select one or more services for this appointment.
schedule.step3_desc: Choose a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.step4_desc: Confirm the payment status for this booking.
schedule.summary_desc: Please review the details below before confirming.
schedule.pending_desc: Mark as pending if payment will be collected later.
schedule.paid_desc: Mark as paid if the client has already paid.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client list.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new client.
add.success_toast_desc: The new customer has been successfully added.

reading.title: AI-Powered Reading
reading.description: Draw cards and generate a personalized interpretation.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards represent the Past, Present, and Future.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: There was an error generating the interpretation. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: A list of all tarot reading services you offer.

pricing.title: Price List
pricing.description: Overview of service pricing and factors.
pricing.table_description: The following are the price ranges for various tarot reading services in Indonesia as of July 2025.

factors.experience: Experience: More well-known or experienced readers may have higher rates.
factors.media: Consultation Media: Offline (face-to-face) readings are usually more expensive.
factors.complexity: Number of questions / spreads: The more complex, the higher the price.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application and service settings.

specializations.title: Service Offerings
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer.

durations.title: Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Set the duration and pricing tiers for your services.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Configure the payment methods you accept.

landing.heroTitle: Discover Your Path, Embrace Your Future.
landing.heroSubtitle: Receive clear, compassionate, and empowering tarot readings from a trusted master to navigate your life's journey with confidence.
landing.aboutText: With over 15 years of experience in the mystic arts, Madame Elena specializes in providing clarity and guidance through the ancient wisdom of tarot. Her readings are known for their depth, compassion, and empowering insights.
landing.servicesSubtitle: Whether you're seeking answers about love, career, or your spiritual path, we have a reading tailored for you.
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: See how Mystic Agenda has helped others find clarity and direction.
